doc.title: The ieatishootipost School Building Fund needs your help!
doc.text: This/DT year/NN ,/, our/JJ aim/NN is/VBZ to/TO raise/VB $/$ 100K/CD for/IN our/PRP$ Sandakan/JJ School/NNP Building/NNP Project/NNP and/CC so/RB far/JJ we/PRP have/VBP just/RB crossed/VB the/DT $/$ 70K/CD mark/NN ,/, so/RB we/PRP have/VBN a/DT bit/NN more/NN work/NN to/TO do/VB !/. Fortunately/JJ ,/, our/JJ sponsors/NN MHCAsia/NN have/VB been/VBN very/RB generous/JJ in/IN their/PRP$ support/NN and/CC in/IN the/DT lead/NN up/NN to/TO their/PRP$ Annual/NN Dinner/NN next/JJ week/NN ,/, they/PRP have/VBP told/VBN me/PRP that/IN they/PRP are/VBP willing/JJ support/NN another/DT fund/JJ raiser/NN for/IN us/PRP ./. As/IN you/PRP know/VBP ,/, we/PRP have/VBN just/RB returned/RB from/IN our/PRP$ Sandakan/JJ trip/NN ./. It/PRP was/VBD a/DT truly/JJ uplifting/NN time/NN for/IN team/NN members/NN as/IN we/PRP toured/VBD the/DT villages/NN to/TO see/VB the/DT progress/NN of/IN the/DT kids/NNS in/IN school/NN ./. The/DT full/JJ report/NN will/MD be/VB ready/JJ by/IN next/JJ week/NN ,/, but/CC in/IN the/DT meantime/NN ,/, I/PRP will/MD just/RB share/VB with/IN you/PRP a/DT photo/NN of/IN one/CD of/IN the/DT schools/NN that/WDT we/PRP help/VB support/NN ./. For/IN this/DT school/NN ,/, we/PRP donated/VBD building/RB materials/JJ worth/NN RM680/NN for/IN the/DT villagers/NN to/TO build/VB a/DT shelter/NN where/WRB the/DT kids/NNS can/MD gather/VB ./. We/PRP are/VBP also/RB helping/VB to/TO fund/VB stationary/NN and/CC the/DT salaries/NN of/IN the/DT teachers/NNP -LRB-/NNP RM300/NNP per/NNP month/NN -RRB-/NN ./. There/EX are/VBP currently/RB 17/JJ such/JJ centres/NN in/IN Sandakan/NN that/IN Goducate/NN is/VBZ supporting/RB ./. This/DT is/VBZ the/DT ieat/JJ mobil/NN which/WDT we/PRP purchased/VBD for/IN $/$ 25K/CD last/JJ year/NN through/IN our/PRP$ fund/JJ raising/NN activites/NN ./. It/PRP has/VBZ been/VBN instrumental/VBG to/TO ferry/VB staff/NNS and/CC kids/NNS to/TO and/CC from/IN really/RB inaccessible/JJ areas/NN and/CC is/VBZ a/DT lifeline/NN for/IN our/PRP$ workers/NN on/IN the/DT ground/NN !/. Website/NNP :/: https://www.facebook.com/MHChealthcare/NNP This/NNP is/VBZ how/RB we/PRP are/VBP going/VBG to/TO raise/VB some/DT funds/JJ today/NN :/: MHCAsia/NN will/MD pay/VB $/$ 10/CD per/NNS like/IN on/IN their/PRP$ facebook/NN page/NN in/IN the/DT lead/NN up/NN to/TO their/PRP$ Annual/NN Dinner/NN ./. All/PDT you/PRP have/VB to/TO do/VB is/VBZ to/TO go/VB to/TO their/PRP$ fanpage/NN and/CC click/VB the/DT ``/JJ Like/NN ''/NN button/NN and/CC then/RB click/VBD to/TO ``/VB Like/NN ''/IN the/DT Goducate/JJ Poster/NN on/IN the/DT Wall/NN ./. Then/RB share/VB it/PRP with/IN your/PRP$ friends/NNS !/. Imagine/JJ ,/, if/IN you/PRP can/MD get/VB 9/LS more/JJR friends/NNS to/TO do/VB the/DT same/JJ you/PRP would/MD have/VB raised/VBN $/$ 100/CD ,/, just/RB with/IN a/DT few/JJ taps/NNS on/IN your/PRP$ keyboard/NN !/. We/PRP hope/VBD to/TO get/VB 3000/JJ likes/NN which/WDT will/MD equate/VB to/TO $/$ 30,000/CD ./. Please/PRP do/VBP spare/RB a/DT minute/NN of/IN your/PRP$ time/NN to/TO do/VB this/DT !/. Many/JJ thanks/NNS for/IN all/DT your/JJ support/NN !/.
